Title: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature in aws-encryption-sdk-java
Description: This advisory addresses several LOW severity issues with streaming signed messages and restricting processing of certain types of invalid messages.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.9.0, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.2.0
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.9.0 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.2.0
